text: jeonjaeng-eseo eod-eun jeonlipum jung-eseo obun-ui il-eun hananimgwa seonjijawa chincheogdeulgwa goadeulgwa bul-uhan jadeulgwa yeohaengjung-e issneun jadeul-ui geos-igeoneul ineun neohuiga hananim-eul midgodu budaega manna sigbyeolhaneun nal ha nanim-ui jong-ege gyesidoen geos-eul mid-eulttaela hananim-eun modeun geos-eul haenghasilgwonneung-eul gajisinola
